name: Necrodungeon
description:
Created for the Roll-the-Dice Game Jam (5/3/2019). Essentially in a prototype phase, but we do intend on working on it further. Our randomly generated prompt was "An adventure game where you explore dungeons with necromancers and collect loot"

.

Controls: 

Move - WASD/Left Joystick

Space/Left Ctrl/A button - Attack

Left Alt/Right Click/B button - Summon Skeleton

Programming: Hackerman#0121 (discord); https://twitter.com/adamhb321 (twitter)

Artist: NoodelyClam#9652 (discord)
